entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
